Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater
    Thermostated heater component for the Household Energy Management project.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater.connections
    Thermostated heater component for the Household Energy Management project.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater 
    Class and Description
    Heater.HeaterState
    The enumeration HeaterState describes the operation states of the heater.
    HeaterInternalControlI
    The interface HeaterInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the heater to its thermostat controller.
    HeaterUserAndControlI
    The interface HeaterUserAndControlI declares the signatures of the methods corresponding both to actions performed by users and by the controllers on the heater.
    HeaterUserAndExternalControlI
    The interface HeaterUserAndExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible both to the user and to the external controller.
    HeaterUserImplI
    The interface HeaterUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the heater: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater.connections 
    Class and Description
    HeaterExternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterExternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the household energy manager to adjust the power consumption of the heater.
    HeaterInternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterInternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the thermostat to control the heating by the heater.
    HeaterInternalControlI
    The interface HeaterInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the heater to its thermostat controller.
    HeaterUserAndControlI
    The interface HeaterUserAndControlI declares the signatures of the methods corresponding both to actions performed by users and by the controllers on the heater.
    HeaterUserAndExternalControlI
    The interface HeaterUserAndExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible both to the user and to the external controller.
    HeaterUserCI
    The component interface HeaterUserCI declares the signature of the services offered and that can be required by the user from the heater.
    HeaterUserImplI
    The interface HeaterUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the heater: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.
